name: Legends (Demo1.0)
description:
According to legend, there is a place in Fairyland called "Jiu Ge Restaurant".
In addition to serving delicious food, it is also an important place for sacrifice.
However, on the day of the Mid-Autumn Festival sacrifice, the sacrificial hall was burned down by the collapsed lamppost for the ceremony being held.
Cause the ghost to go to the world and Fairyland do evil in .
In order to restart the sacrifice, our protagonist "Hong-Niang" must help his parents to buy the ingredients needed for the sacrifice in the town.
And find out the culprit who destroyed the ritual, so that the Fairyland and the mortal world can return to order.
＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊＊
